title: Madeline at cooking school. Madeline and the singing dog.
creator_credit: DIC Entertainment, Family Channel and Stan Phillips
brief_description: Madeline at cooking school: Madeline, the girls and Pepito prepare an awful meal for Lord Cucuface. He enrols them at the famed Cordon Bleu School for cooking lessons with some delicious results! “Madeline and the singing dog”: Genevieve is thrown out of the opera for barking. She is dognapped by a man who wants her to to perform in his dinner theatre. Madeline convinces her favourite canine to give up the life of a star and return to the old house where she is loved by all.
